high_concept: Brutish, primitive human cavemen .Their culture revolves around the hunt, consumption, and transformation of monstrous prey into food,armor and weapons

silhouette.description: Broad, stocky, imposing silhouette with hulking posture, heavy bone armor, giant weapon, and trophy elements, full hide and fur boots
rules: Weapons should be crude but massive: bone clubs, fang axes, shell hammers.
Posture is often hunched or forward-leaning, emphasizing predatory aggression.

mechanical_identity.secondary_resource_notes: Wind represents exertion, fatigue, or frenzy; gear rarely appears except as crude enhancements derived from beasts.
